Package org.opengrok.indexer.history

Class Repository

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opengrok.indexer.history.RepositoryInfo
      • org.opengrok.indexer.history.Repository
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AccuRevRepository, BazaarRepository, BitKeeperRepository, ClearCaseRepository, MonotoneRepository, PerforceRepository, RazorRepository, RCSRepository, RepoRepository, RepositoryWithPerPartesHistory, SCCSRepository, SSCMRepository, SubversionRepository
    public abstract class Repository
extends RepositoryInfo
    An interface for an external repository.
    Author:
    Trond Norbye
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Detail

      • OUTPUT_DATE_FORMAT

        protected static final SimpleDateFormat OUTPUT_DATE_FORMAT
        format used for printing the date in currentVersion.

        NOTE: SimpleDateFormat is not thread-safe, lock must be held when formatting

      • RepoCommand

        protected String RepoCommand
        The command with which to access the external repository. Can be null if the repository isn't accessed via a CLI, or if it hasn't been initialized by ensureCommand(java.lang.String, java.lang.String) yet.

      • ignoredFiles

        protected final List<String> ignoredFiles

      • ignoredDirs

        protected final List<String> ignoredDirs

      • tagList

        protected TreeSet<TagEntry> tagList
        List of <revision, tags> pairs for repositories which display tags only for files changed by the tagged commit.

        protected Repository()

    • Method Detail

      • getLastHistoryEntry

        public HistoryEntry getLastHistoryEntry​(File file,
                                        boolean ui)
                                 throws HistoryException
        This is generic implementation that retrieves the full history of given file and returns the latest history entry. This is obviously very inefficient, both in terms of memory and I/O. The extending classes are encouraged to implement their own version.
        Parameters:
        file - file
        Returns:
        last history entry or null
        Throws:
        HistoryException - on error

      • getRepoCommand

        public String getRepoCommand()
        Gets the instance's repository command, primarily for testing purposes.
        Returns:
        null if not RepositoryInfo.isWorking(), or otherwise a defined command

      • getHistoryGet

        public boolean getHistoryGet​(File target,
                             String parent,
                             String basename,
                             String rev)
                      throws IOException
        Gets the contents of a specific version of a named file, and copies into the specified target file.
        Parameters:
        target - a required target file which will be overwritten
        parent - the name of the directory containing the file
        basename - the name of the file to get
        rev - the revision to get
        Returns:
        true if contents were found
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs

      • getHistoryGet

        @Nullable
public @Nullable InputStream getHistoryGet​(String parent,
                                           String basename,
                                           String rev)
        Gets an InputStream of the contents of a specific version of a named file.
        Parameters:
        parent - the name of the directory containing the file
        basename - the name of the file to get
        rev - the revision to get
        Returns:
        a defined instance if contents were found; or else null

      • parse

        public Date parse​(String dateString)
           throws ParseException
        Parse the given string as a date object with the repository date formats.
        Parameters:
        dateString - the string representing the date
        Returns:
        the instance of a date
        Throws:
        ParseException - when the string can not be parsed correctly

      • getCommand

        protected static String getCommand​(Class<? extends Repository> repoClass,
                                   String propertyKey,
                                   String fallbackCommand)

      • ensureCommand

        protected String ensureCommand​(String propertyKey,
                               String fallbackCommand)
        Set the name of the external client command that should be used to access the repository wrt. the given parameters. Does nothing, if this repository's RepoCommand has already been set (i.e. has a non-null value).
        Parameters:
        propertyKey - property key to look up the corresponding system property.
        fallbackCommand - the command to use, if lookup fails.
        Returns:
        the command to use.
        See Also:
        RepoCommand

      • getRepoRelativePath

        protected String getRepoRelativePath​(File file)
                              throws IOException
        Parameters:
        file - File object
        Returns:
        relative path to repository root
        Throws:
        IOException - on I/O error
